Furthermore , study show transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) also suppress tinnitus . Objective : To determine effectiveness rTMS TDCS treatment patient chronic tinnitus auditory loss . Methods : We perform analytical experimental double-blind study use rTMS tDCS patient chronic tinnitus hearing loss .
